product_name: Rollerblade Lux Inline Skating Wrist Guards - Special Buy
long_description: The Rollerblade Lux Inline Skating wrist guards feature a sleek, contoured design and are lined with CoolMax(R) to keep you comfortable when on the move. Polyethylene plastic stands up to hard surfaces; polyurethane padding adds cushioning; CoolMax linings wick away moisture and dry quickly. Wrist guards secure with rip-and-stick closures. Special buy.
